means: 变少( lessen的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The pain had lessened in the night, but so had his lucidity.
sentence.Network_cn: 夜里他的痛苦是减轻了，但人也不那么清醒了。

sentence.Network_en: Listening to the speech through an interpreter lessened its impact somewhat.
sentence.Network_cn: 演讲辞通过翻译的嘴说出来,多少削弱了演讲的力量.

sentence.Network_en: The flight to suburbia lessened the number of middle - class families living within the city.
sentence.Network_cn: 随着迁往郊外的风行,住在城内的中产家庭减少了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: lessen 减少lessened 减少的lessening 减轻
2013职称... ... assembled——gathered 装配,组合 alleviated——lessened 使(痛苦等)易于忍受, 减轻 abide by——stick to 坚持, 遵守.
He lessened the achievements of his rival., 他贬抑他对手的成绩.
The program has lessened the traditional conflict between herders and lions ., 这个项目就减少了传统的在牧人和狮子之间的利益争斗.

specialist Kalichi of agriculture ministry says , increasing of food taking for a rabbit , could help to enhance its immunity , make it healthier and lessen illness attack , then speed the growth .农业部专家凯利奇表示，兔子进食增加，有助于提升它的免疫功能，增进健康，减少疾病侵袭，进而促进兔子的生长。

the conductivity is proportional to volume of steel-fiber to some extent . this behavior will be helpful to decrease temperature gradient and lessen surface thermal stress of concrete structure .根据热传导理论，给出了钢纤维掺量与混凝土导温系数的关系，得出钢纤维混凝土有较好的导热性，该特性对水工混凝土结构防止表面裂
v. 减轻，减少lessen tensions 缓和紧张局势[同]diminish

entry.def: If something lessens or you lessen it, it becomes smaller in size, amount, degree, or importance.

example.ex: He is used to a lot of attention from his wife, which will inevitably lessen when the baby is born...
example.tran: 他习惯了妻子对他的百般关注，但孩子出生后这种关注就会不可避免地减少。

example.ex: Make sure that your immunisations are up to date to lessen the risk of serious illness.
example.tran: 要确保接种最新的疫苗，以降低患上严重疾病的危险。

means.word_mean: 2. decreased in severity; made less harsh

auth_sentence.content: The number of attacks lessened, although sporadic attacks continue.

Sentence.sentence: As a result, violations of the law and abuses of the intent of the law have lessened the financial rewards of authors, artists and producers.
